subject: having tearDown invoked also on setUp failure
msgSnippet: The default junit behavior is, for each testXXX method to invoke : public void runBare() throws Throwable { setUp(); try { runTest(); } finally { tearDown(); }
messageBody:
The default junit behavior is, for each testXXX method to invoke :

public void runBare() throws Throwable {
setUp();
try {
runTest();
}
finally {
tearDown();
}
}


this means that _tearDown() is not invoked on setUp() failure_
which is a problem if setUp fails 1/2 way after having created some
persistent resources
(e.g. database data, eclipse test projects ...)

a simple solution that works well for me, is to override runBare()
(e.g. in a base testcase class for the project) :

/**
* override to have tearDown called on setUp failure
*/
public final void runBare() throws Throwable {
try {
setUp();
runTest();
}
finally {
tearDown();
}
}
